eyin ugath padam nowannata.in ismathu wu upakrama ha susamadarshi nayakathwaya harain ithuru wu yamak natha.in dayada kala dhairyaye ha kapawime padama uganmata an thanak natha. 1991 pasu ithihasaya awasana yayi da, dan loka parimana wa dhanawadaya thahawuru wa awasan yayi da,manushya wargaya ge daiwaya liyawi awasan bawada nan dodawana dhaneshwara kapatin ha bathbalayanta uththaradimata samajawadi namadhari paksha rodu wala alasa nayakathwaya idiripath nowima ee ayage thawakalika jayagrahanayaki. 2017 wasara shreshta okthobar wiplawaye siya wani wasara satahan karana wasara bawa ‘lankawiws‘ pataka obata api kalthabama sihipath kalemu.

meya sampurna sathyayaki.wadidura wisthara danna bawin uuna puranayak ekkarami.2004 sunami anathurin galledi pidawata pathwu saha ema anathure barapathala bawa siyasin dutu jarmaniye hitapu chansalar waraya wana helmut kol mahatha madihathwa mema nawa rohal sankirnaya labadena bawata porondu wi atha.ehidi ohu wisin illa aththe godanagili idikirimata awashya bimak pamani.wasarak thula shramaya athulu siyalu wiyadam daramin siyalu upakarana sahithawa paripurna mathru ha lama eekakayak labadimata ohu paudgalikawama porondu wi aththe ewakata mahamodara rohale nari ha prasawa weda eekakaye mahacharya malik gunawardhana mahathataya.eheth ewakata siti saukhya amathiwarayage ha janadhipathi chandrika kumarathungage sruju deshapalana balapama matha sudusu bhumiyak labadima pramada karana ladi.thawada mahamodara rohala ethanin iwathkara wenath sthanayaka pihituwimata wiruddhawa rohalen srujuwa ha wakrawa wasi labu awata hotal himiyan athulu eeniya wyaparika prajawa udghoshanada kalaha.
awrudu kipayakata kalin ...ehema kenek hitiya yanna puluwan narakatama giye.

mul pandudawa pandu , pothu pandu , kola pandu , mal pandu pala pandu washayen me siyalla niyama kale swabhawika gaha kola walini.parani bhikshun wahanse mul pandu sandaha kos mul da, dawa pandu sandaha nuga wargada pothu pandu sandaha kiripalla pothu aadiya da mal pandu sandaha sepalika mal wani deda bhawitha kalaha.me anuwa sakas karagath kada kapu sangala siwura , kada kapu uthuru ghana siwura, kada kapu andana bhikshun wisin bhawitha kala yuthuyayi anudana wadalaha.

(chakkhusmin na manynyathi) asen bahirawa mama innawa kiyala mamathwayen hithanne na (chakkhutho na manynyathi) asa mage kiya mamathwayen hithanne na (chakkhun methi na manynyathi)ee wagema ase winynyanaya mama kiya mamathwayen hithanne na.

2011 signis uththamachara sammana laba! 1."bambaara walalla" chithrapataye nirmanashili sangithaya wenuwen    kasun kalhara jayawardhana. 2."uththara" chithrapataya wenuwen hondama gayanaya    uresha rawihari sammana laba. 3."bambaara walalla" chithrapataye hondama kamarakaranaya wenuwen    thrishuladipa thambaawita. 4.hondama sinama sahaya naluwata himi uththamachara sammanaya shriyantha mendista, swarna sammanayen pidum labu damitha aberathna, handama teli natya sahaya niliya "oba kawuda" teli natyaye himali sayurangi saha swarna sinama ha ranga kusalatha sammana dinu mahendra perera 5.hondama teli natya sahaya naluwa "abarthu atha" natyaye suminda sirisenata, 6.sudath mahadiwulawawa nirmanashili wartha chithrapataya, welanda danwima athulu sammana thunak
